Introduction

Mako Yamaguchi, typically known as Mako, is a Japanese singer under JYP Entertainment. She ranked 1st in the Nizi Project and debuted as the leader of NiziU.

JYP Entertainment:
Jan 1, 2018-present

Fun facts

1
According to herself on Nizi U Log #2, her keywords are: Fashionnotebook (Wants to become a fashion designer, has a fashion notebook that she uses to draw for clothing ideas), Dryer (her hair doesn't dry properly without it), Speed sleeper (falls asleep instantly), Vacuum cleaner (likes using it), Apples (loves having one each morning), Books (Reads a little before bed), Dialect (Speaks with one when speaking with members), Lights (She needs a bright room to work).
…
2
During season 1 of Nizi Project Maku had braces.
…
3
Maku is the member with the longest training period (4 years, from 2017 to 2020, when she debuted with NiziU).
